name: Adept Rey
effect:
Free Kingdoms* Monk
React: After Adept Rey enters play: Until the end of the turn, Friar Rey performs an extra melee strike (base +1 ATK) when he attacks.
"Fire only burns if you let it. Kavara's too easily distracted."

name: Albrecht Novice
effect:
Free Kingdoms* Cantor
React: After Albrecht Novice enters play: Give adjacent characters +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.
"Denska is in need, and the Aroch rebuild. We will be with you soon." - Terak Justicebringer

name: Alchemist's Arrows
effect:
Arrow
Fighter and rogue only. Scouts and Rangers have +2 levels to equip.
React: After this character hits with a non-spell ranged strike, spend the Arrows: Characters adjacent to the original target must make a Reflex save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.

name: Angry Winds
effect: Spend Order: Put this card into play in any of your ranks as a level 2 fighter with +5 ATK, 13 AC, +3 Skill, 1 HP, the Elemental trait, and the text "Characters in this rank have +4 AC against ranged strikes." The Elemental is killed at the end of the turn. If the caster is a Druid, the Elemental has 2 HP.

name: Aroch Mail
effect:
ATK: +1 AC: +3
Armor * Unique
If this character is a Paladin or cleric, other characters in this rank with the same alignment have +1 ATK and +3 AC.
"The blessings of the sun, the aegis of Albrecht, the scales of the golden dragon." - Sir Lorden

name: Arstus Kant
effect:
Free Kingdoms* Assassin * Denska
React: Before Arstus Kant inflicts wounds with a melee strike: The target of the strike must make a Fortitude save (DC 11) or become spent.

name: Atone
effect:
Dwarf
Spend React: After Atone enters play: Remove one wound from one of your DWARVES.
"Heroism isn't about doing things right for others, it's about doing right by others."

name: Bascaron's Favor
effect: Order: Discard Bascaron's Favor: An adjacent character who has received no permanent bonuses gains +4 ATK, +4 AC, or +5 Skill permanently. If this cleric is a Cantor, the character may instead gain +1 Hit Point permanently.

name: Blackthorn's Legacy
effect:
Bard only.
Spend Order: The next die roll one of your characters makes is a "10" (add bonuses as normal).
"Castle Blackthorn fell, but not before the paladin dealt a telling blow to the Dark Horsemen." - Baudwyn Troubador

name: Blackwaters
effect:
Mercenary* Monster
May not equip items.
React: Before Blackwaters suffers more than one wound: Make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + level of the character inflicting the wounds) to reduce the wounds inflicted to one.

name: Blade and Chain
effect:
ATK: +1
Weapon * Shield * Riposte +5
Weapons give no ATK bonus to melee strikes against this character.
React: After you hit with a melee strike caused by a Riposte check: Discard a Weapon equipped by the target.

name: Bleed
effect:
Dwarf* Assassin * Stealth +4
React: Once per turn, after failing a Stealth check: Until the end of the turn, the next time Bleed suffers wounds, the wounds are reduced by one. This is a Stealth action.

name: Bohst
effect:
Nothrog* Scout * Misear
React: After Bohst enters play: Make a skill check (DC 9). If successful, move one of your Nothrog forward one rank.
"Offer accepted, Krun." - Vronish Kez

name: Bola
effect:
Order: Spend the Bola: Perform a +4 ranged strike which spends the target instead of wounding it.
"If you need one alive." - Captain Dukat

name: Book of Days
effect: Order: If you have not discarded any copies of Book of Days this turn, discard all copies of the Book of Days in your army: Your hand size during your next draw phase is increased by the number of Books discarded. Book of Days that are attached to Seers may be shuffled into the deck instead of discarded.

name: Bright Blessings
effect:
Seers play this without spending.
Spend React: After one of your characters enters play: attach this card to the character: While it is attached, the character may perform the action: "React: Before this character makes a roll, discard Bright Blessings: Add +10 to the roll."

name: Bruntor's Mail
effect:
AC: +3
Armor
While this character has at least three items with "Bruntor's" in the title, this character has +1 level and +5 Skill.
"The Denskan king's armor and helm..." - Lord Halbrook

name: Bruntor's Shield
effect:
AC: +2
Shield
While this character has at least two items with "Bruntor's" in the title, this character has an extra +5 AC (+7 total) during ranged strikes.
"... and shield. Useless, without the man inside them." - Lord Halbrook

name: Calavera
effect:
Familiar * Scribe +2
Cleric and wizard only.
Order: Spend Calavera: Shuffle an item this character can equip from the discard pile into the deck.
"Reveal to me Bruntor's vestments." - Sorceress Ygraine

name: Calix Guard
effect:
Elf* Undead * Calix
Guard may not start in play or enter play normally.
React: After a character in an opposing first rank dies, you may put Calix Guard into play from your hand.
"This is how I use failures. Make a note of it, generals." - Tepheroth

name: Call the Abyss
effect:
Summoners play this without spending.
Spend React: After this character enters play or moves into the first rank: Put this card in play in the first rank as an Evil level 1 Fighter with the Astral, Abyssal and Monster traits, +4 ATK, 1 AC, +2 Skill, and 1 HP.

name: Cardinal Bromin
effect:
Deverenian* Cantor
React: After Cardinal Bromin enters play: Give another Deverenian character +4 ATK, +4 Skill, and +4 AC until the end of the next turn.
"The Inquisition doth besiege Order Genecourt of my father's line. Faith sustaineth me beyond age, but my blameless cousins cannot endure."

name: Chain
effect:
Dwarf
React: After Chain enters play: Gain +3 AC and +1 Hit Point until the end of the turn.

name: Chameleon Form
effect:
AC: +3
LycanthropeForm * Lycanthrope only. After this item is equipped, discard all other items equipped by this character. This character may not equip items that are not LycanthropeForms. Feats performed by this character are considered Stealth actions. Stealth+5 * Medicine+5

name: Chant
effect:
Dwarf* Cantor
Dwarves adjacent to Chant have +2 AC.
"We sing of heroes fallen and of Kor's boundless mercy, and of the lost relic of St. Vorhim."

name: Cheap Fodder
effect:
Mercenary
If Cheap Fodder is in play at the end of the turn, make a Will check (DC 12). If successful, shuffle him into your deck. Otherwise, he is killed.
React: After Cheap Fodder enters play: Move him forward one rank.
~Don't worry. The gods aren't done with this one.~

name: Circle Kick
effect:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: Before this character makes a melee strike roll: Subtract 3 from the roll. If the strike hits, inflict a wound on an adjacent character with equal or lower AC then the target.

name: Claidh Mor
effect:
ATK: 3 AC: -1
Weapon
React: After inflicting one or more wounds with a melee strike, spend the Claidh Mor: Move the target of the strike back one rank and spend him.
Rraag'nar whirled about, and soon, no dwarf dared face him.

name: Collapsing Mines
effect:
Druid or Gargoyle only.
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, spend all characters entering play.
"Do it! Break them down before the Noth-" - Gnorrow Yaw

name: Conscripts
effect:
Mercenary
React: After one of your characters kills an opposing character: Put Conscripts into play from your hand.
"Hire any able-bodied men you can, Sceth, and assign them to the front lines" - Krun

name: Coordinated Shot
effect:
Scout or Ranger only.
Order: Spend another character in this rank with a printed ranged strike: Add the printed value of that ranged strike to all ranged strikes made by this character until the end of this turn.
Those who survived Toris Kelt did not always return home.

name: Coriel
effect:
Elf* Mentalist * Nimbic
Spend React: Before an adjacent Elf targets a character with an action that does not produce melee or ranged strikes: The action may target one rank farther than usual.
"I see spirits, necromancer. Do you?"

name: Countersong
effect:
Bards play this without spending.
Spend React: After an opposing character casts a spell or uses a "Bard only" action: Make a Charisma check (DC 15 + level of action). If successful, the action is cancelled.
"The albino ones really twitch if you time the high notes." - Jaqueline Windson

name: Crucin Bascar
effect:
MercenaryWarlord * Cantor * Priest of Bascaron
React: After a character enters play, discard a card. The character permanently gains the Monster trait. Do not discard a card if the character is yours.
Spend Order: Your Monsters have +3 ATK until the end of the turn.

name: Dame Selen
effect:
Deverenian* Paladin
React: After losing initiative: Gain +4 AC until the end of the turn.
React: After winning initiative: Gain +4 ATK until the end of the turn.
"The end is nigh. Repent, or fall and be damned."

name: Dark Alley
effect:
React: After targeting a character at the end of a rank with a melee strike: Add +3 ATK for the strike. If this character is an Assassin, add +6 ATK instead.
Deserted elven streets proved no less dangerous to the Deverenian patrols.

name: De'zicrah
effect:
NothrogWarlord * Scout
React: Once per turn, after a character enters play: Move forward or backward one rank or perform a +4 ranged strike.
"New Goldenaxe belongs to Uthanak."

name: Delirium
effect:
Mentalist and Wizard only.
Spend Order: Target non-Warlord character who must make a Will save (DC 8 + the caster's skill) or he can't perform actions until the end of the turn.
"Why, Solace, what troubles thee so?" - Emil Tzin

name: Dire Portents
effect:
Seers play this without spending.
Spend React: After an opposing character enters play, attach this card to the character: while it is attached, your clerics may perform the action: "React: Before a character makes a roll, discard Dire Portents from that character: Subtract 10 from the roll."

name: Displacement
effect:
Spend Order: Switch the locations of two characters in the same army who are within one rank of each other. Opposing characters targeted must be lower level than this wizard.
"Another time, sir knight." - Ichaerus

name: Divining Cards
effect:
Order: Spend the Divining Cards: Look at the top two cards of any deck, and put them at the bottom or top of the deck in the same order. Seers look at the top five cards.
Behlial nodded. "Thank you, child. Now prepare for the next one."

name: Drum
effect:
Dwarf* Bard
React: After Drum enters play: Spend a level 1 character.
"He pounded away as the Storm rolled past to d'Ilchant Keep, and kept the beat perfectly." - Purge

name: Duon
effect:
Elf* Marksmanship +3 * Glyn
Duon may apply the Marksmanship feat to ranged strikes from spells. Wounds Duon inflicts with spells may not be reduced or negated.
"If the Tansiq rumors amount to anything, I will remind them why Flesh is the weakest Element."

name: Dutan Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian* Monk * Defend +3 * Genecourt
React: After a successful use of the Defend feat: Make a Defend check (DC 20) to cancel the redirected action or strike.
"Order Genecourt hath long served the Church in loving faith. AN thou findeth a traitor among us, I shall stand aside. Not before."

name: Emil Tzin
effect:
Deverenian* Mentalist
React: After Emil Tzin targets or is targeted by a melee strike: All items on the opposing character are considered blank for the duration of the strike.
"How very peculiarï¿½ this thing the Lady Eryne hath discovered doth spread like a thing alive and of its own mind."

name: Evon Myerdeth
effect:
Deverenian* Cantor * Unique
Evon Myerdeth may remain spent during the Ready Phase.
Spend Order: If your Warlord is a Deverenian, give him +4 ATK, +4 AC, +1 HP, or +4 Skill until Evon Myerdeth readies, or leaves play.

name: Father Ansance
effect:
Deverenian* Seer * Genecourt
React: Once per turn, before a roll: If Ansance entered play this turn, the roll gains +15 and ignores Critical Failures.
"Lies and treachery. Whatever shadow you seeketh, you shall not find it here."

name: Fidelis Ghenis
effect:
Deverenian* Monk * Riposte +3 * Ghenis
Fidelis Ghenis may use the Riposte feat any number of times per turn, and gainst +5 ATK during a strike caused by Riposte.
"The Emperor bids thee welcome, Baruuk."

name: Fighting Sticks
effect:
ATK: +1
Weapon
Monk and rogue only.
React: After wounding an equal or lower level opposing character: Spend that character.
"Now, was that club, punch, thrust..." - Kun Hull

name: Fireflies
effect: React: After this character enters play or moves into the first rank: Target a number of ready character in an opposing first rank up to the caster's level. The targets must succeed with a magic save (DC 12, DC 17 if cast by an Illusionist) or become spent.

name: Flaming Sphere
effect:
Spend Order: Target a number of characters in an adjacent rank up to the caster's level. Each target must make a magic save (DC 8 + this wizard's Skill) or suffer a wound.
"Do you smell something?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Forest's Hunger
effect: Spend Order: Target a rank. Until the end of the turn, any character who moves into that rank must make a Dexterity save (DC 14, DC 19 if the caster is a Druid) or become spent. Spent characters who fail become stunned.

name: Gallows Root
effect:
ATK: 2 AC: -3
Weapon
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike which does an extra wound if it hits. Barbarians have Powerattack+5 for the strike.
"Out of the way, Yaw." - Uthas Battleheim

name: Gi'Yarr
effect:
Nothrog* Monk * VoTaurr
While he has no items equipped, Gi'Yarr has +4 ATK and inflicts an additional wound whenever he hits with a melee strike.
"An heretic, trained not by the Spider, but by the Storm." - The Stone Spider

name: Glamered Glens
effect: Spend Order: Target one of your characters. Until the end of the next turn, he may perform actions as though he were in an opposing formation. If the caster is an Illusionist, the target receives Stealth+4 until the end of the next turn.

name: Gloves of Trespass
effect:
Gauntlet * Unique
React: After targeting a spent character with a melee strike, spend the Gloves: The target must make a Fortitude save (DC 5 + Rogue's skill, DC 10 + Rogue's skill if this character is an Assassin) or the strike is a Critical Success.

name: Great Crossbow
effect:
Bow
Fighter and rogue only.
Spend Order: Spend Great Crossbow: Perform a +5 ranged strike which targets a character exactly three ranks away and inflicts an extra wound if it hits. Stun Great Crossbow.

name: Hate Rider
effect:
Nothrog* Riding +2
React: After Hate Rider enters play: Gain Riding+10 until the end of the turn.
Lonely howls fill the night, and then the dwarves were dying.

name: Havoc
effect:
Dwarf* Barbarian
React: After a Dwarf enters play adjacent to Havoc: Move Havoc forward one rank.
"Nothrogs now know fear" - Purge

name: Heartstrings
effect:
Order: Spend Heartstrings: Target a lower level character who must make a Will save (DC 15). If the save fails, or if this character is a Bard, the target can't attack this turn.
"Even Deverenians fall prey, if you know which to pluck." - Phon

name: Higher Awareness
effect:
Mentalist and rogue only.
React: After this character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike) by an opposing character: The originating character must make a Will save (DC 8 + this character's skill) or suffer a wound and the action is cancelled.

name: Hrak
effect:
Nothrog* Barbarian
React: After Hrak enters play: Gain +5 ATK until the end of the turn.
"Sarakia? Piddle. Ya ever try catchin' Shattered Lands snipe?"

name: Hurricane Horn
effect: Spend Order: Target a rank within two ranks. Each character in that rank must make a Fortitude save (DC 5 + This rogue's skill) or be stunned. If this character is a Bard, Siege characters which fail are killed.

name: Initiate Boralis
effect:
Deverenian* Seer
React: After Initiate Boralis enters play: Add +20 to your Warlord's next Initiative roll.
"Beg pardon, milady Ygraine, but perhaps you have overlooked a detailï¿½"

name: Inquisitor Chyre
effect:
DeverenianWarlord * Monk
React: After another character enters play and performs a REACT printed on himself: Chyre performs the same REACT.
React: Once per turn, after a character targets Chyre with a melee strike: Move Chyre back one rank. The strike is cancelled.

name: Inquisitor Piotr
effect:
Deverenian* Monk * Defend +5
Piotr may use the Defend feat as a react to any higher level Deverenian in his rank being targeted, instead of just adjacent characters.
"Surrender to the Inquisition, Dutan. Our fight is not with thee."

name: Ivaas
effect:
Mercenary* Seer * Unique
Spend React: After looking at one or more cards from your deck, discard a card: Draw a card or shuffle your deck.
Order: Once per turn: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck.

name: Jevae
effect:
Elf* Necromancer * Tansiq
Spend React: After Jevae enters play: Target an opposing first rank. Each character in that rank must make a magic save (DC 9) or suffer a wound.
"We offer you much, Netheryn, and ask for so very little.."

name: Kabal Spire
effect:
Mercenary* Siege
May not start in play, or perform actions other than Maneuvers. DC saves from actions performed by characters in a rank with one or more unstunned Kabal Spires are increased by +3.

name: Kapix
effect:
Elf* Scout
React: After Kapix enters play: Discard an item within two ranks.
"Even verdatha die to a well-placed arrowhead."

name: Kara Wadreth
effect:
Free KingdomsWarlord * Ranger * March Lord
May equip two Weapons.
React: After one of your FreeKingdoms characters enters play, discard a card: Move the character forward or backward one rank.
"No kings here. Only mud."

name: Kavara's Glare
effect:
Unique
Spend Order: Discard Kavara's Glare: Target a rank within two ranks. Each character in that rank and any adjacent ranks must make a magic save (DC 14) or suffer two wounds.

name: Keep Up the Pace
effect:
React: After entering play: Move forward one rank. If this fighter is a Ranger he may perform a melee strike after moving.
"Phrygai is besieged! I must warn Yaw!" - Squire Parthus

name: Kelaris
effect:
Elf* Marksmanship +2 * Syneri
Kelaris may apply the Marksmanship feat to ranged strikes from spells.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"The Deverenians think they alone are masters of war magic? Fools."

name: Khap'pin
effect:
Nothrog* Monk * Riposte +4 * VoTaurr
"Blastï¿½ what I wouldn't give to taste the power the nimbics stole from the temples."Mekk'iah did not answer.

name: Koranos
effect:
Free Kingdoms* Cantor
React: After Koranos enters play: FreeKingdoms characters in your front rank have +2 ATK and +2 AC until the end of the turn.
"Kor's faithful offer what help they can, Lord Halbrook."

name: Kray
effect:
Nothrog* Scout * Boar Legion
Spend React: After Kray enters play: Perform a +5 ranged strike that targets a spent character in an opposing first rank.
Spend Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"Nothing like the love between a mother and son. Nothing like it at all."

name: Kun Atoll
effect:
Mercenary* Monk
React: After an attack during which Kun Atoll was targeted with one or more melee strikes: Perform an attack.
"Monks are supposed to be poor. Try telling him that." - Kun Tzin

name: Kun Robes
effect:
Armor
Monk and rogue only.
React: Before a melee or ranged strike targeting this character, spend the Robes: Gain an AC bonus until the end of the turn equal to the number of cards in the opponent's hand.

name: Lead In Prayer
effect:
Order: Target a character within one rank. Until the end of the turn, other characters in the target's rank and with the same alignment as this cleric have +3 ATK. If the caster is a Cantor, they have +3 AC and +3 Skill as well.
"Flesh to Blood, Blood to Bone, Bone to Spirit." - Sileth Elestra

name: Lekar Osud
effect:
ElfWarlord * Summoner * Scribe +5
All of your action cards are considered spells.
Order: Reveal a card from your hand: Perform a Scribe check (DC 20). If successful, attach the card to Osud, face-down. You may play the card at any time as if from your hand. If unsuccessful, discard it.

name: Levitate
effect:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Order: Move backward one rank or move to a different position in this rank.
React: Before this character falls forward from an illegal rank: This character does not spend or stun when falling forward.
"Animals? We are paragons of men, and the elves still employ base beasts?" - Lady Eryne

name: Lift Up Your Voices
effect: Spend Order: Target your characters who share alignment and a faction with this cleric. Until the end of the turn, the targets gain Skill and AC bonuses equal to this cleric's level. If the caster is a Cantor, they also receive a ATK bonus equal to his level.

name: Lodestone Buckler
effect:
AC: +1
Shield
Monks may equip this item. +3 AC (+4 total) against ranged strikes.
"Wait, what if they're using flint?" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Lost Yscarite
effect:
Mercenary* Assassin * Lycanthrope
Stealth+6 * Bascaron Lost Yscarite has an extra melee strike (+5 ATK) while attacking if in an opposing formation.
"It is a danger we all face: wanting power, but only wanting enough." - Varson Yscar

name: Luka Yscar
effect:
Free Kingdoms* Monk * Lycanthrope
Order: Spend an equipped Lycanthrope Form: Perform a melee strike.
"Baraxton to Lukkot to Mourn. I'veï¿½ arranged it."

name: Lykos
effect:
Familiar
+3 Skill.
Order: Spend Lykos: Discard a Steed or Familiar within three ranks.
"Not all the wolves at Phrygai bore Hate's Riders. I spied one watching and feasting upon the fallen." - Cador

name: Ma'Ken
effect:
Nothrog* Monk * VoTaurr
React: Before Ma'Ken performs a melee strike roll, discard a card: Ma'Ken gains +4 ATK until the end of the turn.
"Tell Rreg'jenn that we will uphold our end of the bargain, but that we will make sure there are no further surprises." - Mekk'iah

name: Make It Count
effect:
Fighter and Monk only.
React: Before this character performs a melee strike, cancel the strike: The next melee strike this character performs this turn has an ATK bonus equal to the cancelled strike's base ATK, and inflicts an additional wound if it hits.

name: Markappal Ivy
effect:
Mercenary* Monster * Druid
Spend React: After another character enters play: Spend the character.
"It hides in the underbrush, and it's always hungry." - Percy Dorn

name: Mental Assault
effect:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks who must make a Will save (DC 9, DC 11 if this character is a Mentalist for each card in his controller's hand. Each time the target fails, he suffers one wound.

name: Mind Gate
effect:
Mentalist and wizard only.
Order: Spend the Mind Gate: Target a character and make a Will check (DC 10 + target's skill, 5 + target's skill if this character is a Mentalist)S to move that character forward or backward one rank.

name: Mirage Potion
effect:
React: After this character is targeted by an action (not a melee strike), discard the Potion: Cancel the action.
React: After equipping the Potion: If this character is an Illusionist, equip the Potion to another character in this rank, regardless of class and level.

name: Mistiff
effect:
Mercenary* Monster
You must have an Illusionist in your army to bring Mistiff into play. Characters hit by Mistiff's melee strikes are stunned but not wounded.
"One part shadow, one part substance, and morning dew rises as a hound to do thy bidding." - Xaros the Mist

name: Monkey's Paws
effect:
ATK: +2
Gauntlet * Unique * Def
Fighter and Monk only. If this character has no Weapon equipped, he performs one extra melee strike during attacks with a base of +2 ATK and inflicts one extra wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Morghen's Staff
effect:
Weapon * Shield
Order: Once per turn: Until the end of the turn, gain a Skill bonus equal to the number of characters in one player's discard pile. If this wizard is a Necromancer, also gain an ATK bonus of the same amount.

name: Mourn Imp
effect:
Mercenary* Monster
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"They were sentries once, before Mournwater learned how little can hold their attention." - Yscar the Elder

name: Mourn Pattern
effect:
React: After casting a spell which puts a character into play, discard the Mourn Pattern: Ready this wizard. Summoners may do this once per turn without discarding Mourn Pattern.
"Such sights to show you."

name: Nelwys
effect:
Elf* Syneri
Spend React: After an Elf in the rank behind this one targets a non-spell ranged strike: The ranged strike inflicts an extra wound if it hits.
"Of course, Artheon. What else do the Ten require?"

name: Neus Preserve Us!
effect:
Cantors play this without spending.
Spend React: After this character enters play or moves into the first rank: Target a character in your army who gainst +5 ATK until the end of the turn.
"That Deverenian madwoman's not giving up!" - Lord Halbrook

name: Novice Catin
effect:
Deverenian* Monk
React: After an action or strike performed by a character in an adjacent rank is canceled: Perform a melee strike (base +3 ATK) targeting that character.
"An he speaketh out of turn again, Piotr, thou canst slay him."

name: Obsidian Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf* AssassinGargoyle * Stealth +8
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Obsidian Garoyle or to bring one into play.
"The magma gargoyles rose to follow us, but fell from Sjonegaard's favor in the journey." - Byaal Kadapati

name: Ophorus
effect:
Elf* Druid * Unique
Spend Order: Target a rank within three ranks. Ready characters moving out of that rank become spent before moving, and spent characters moving out become stunned.
"The dead leading the dead? How unnatural."

name: Outmatched
effect:
React: After an opposing character enters play in the first rank or moves into the first rank: If this fighter is in your first rank, perform a melee strike targeting that character.
Some elves remembered too late why the Deverenians once ruled all the world.

name: Percy Dorn
effect:
Free Kingdoms* Ranger * Markappal
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
"I can take you to the mainland, Dukat. Just step where I step, and for the love of Ishara, keep your head down."

name: Perfect
effect:
Dwarf* Mentalist
React: After Perfect enters play: Target a character in an opposing first rank who must make a Will save (DC 14) or be stunned.
"There is no failure. Failure is luxury and laziness. We are better than that."

name: Perfect Focus
effect:
Monk and Mentalist only.
React: Before a melee strike roll: Add this character's Skill to his ATK for the duration of the strike.
"Kedric will not tell us of what he saw in the Plane of Secrets." - Callenor Tzin

name: Primal Rage
effect: Order: Suffer one wound: Until the end of the turn, this character has +5 ATK and performs an extra melee strike when attacking (base +1 ATK). If this character is a Barbarian, Monster, or Lycanthrope, he inflicts an extra wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Quick Shot
effect:
React: After winning initiative: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If this rogue is a Scout, this action may be performed after losing initiative.
"This is how we hunt in Markappal, Dukat." - Kara Wadreth

name: Rabid Bite
effect:
Druid and Lycanthrope only.
React: Before inflicting wounds with a melee strike: The target must make a Fortitude save (DC 15) or suffer an extra wound.
